website_summaries.verdict: The JBL Synchros Reflect earphones are affordable and exercise-focused with massive bass response and a reflective design to keep you visible while running or biking at night.
pros: Huge bass response with sculpted highs, and no distortion at top volumes
Reflective design ideal for remaining visible when exercising outdoors
cons: Sound signature is very sculpted and not for purists
Eartip fit can be tricky to master at first

customer_reviews.title: Yes my wife and I love JBL products we have an issue with the silicone ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes my wife and I love JBL products we have an issue with the silicone ear piece coming off. I have been in contact with JBL but their solution is to send the unit back instread of replacing the ear piece. I purchase the first set of JBLs from a box store...my wife tried them and we then purchase the next set through Amazon. But we both lost one of the ear pieces. Great sound and great microphone when using the phone, clarity. Highly recommend them. Just use caution with ear pieces because of the softness of the material they grab and come off. They do stay in your ear well.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, not safe for street use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for the gym, riding my bike, and running. They perform really well; they are light, sound great, fit comfortably in my ear (three sets of ear fittings are included), and don't budge once they are in there. They also do a great job of sealing out sound, so much so that if you wear them while riding, running, etc on the street, you will not hear the bus that's about to run you over. They are great, but not safe for street use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lawn mowing or snow blowing
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something to not fall out of my ears while mowing the lawn and these are it. I put a pair of over the head ear protectors over top for greater hearing protection and not cranking the volume but also to try and anchor the ear buds but they would fall out. I tried coiling the wire around my ears and still no luck. These are an amazing fit, the sound, and the ability to stay in. I haven't mowed yet but they were perfect while snow blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Sunkist

customer_reviews.title: These do not integrate well with Android
customer_reviews.text: The headphones worked fine at first, but after a few months they began to interact with my phone (HTC One M8) in undesirable ways when I'm working out. Specifically, in Google Music it skips to the next song for no reason. I tried using them on a different phone (Droid Bionic), and it kept trying to make a call. It's frustrating and annoying. I tried other headphones on the same phones and have had no problems, so I know that these headphones are the crux of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. They sound good and stay in the ears pretty well but the microphone part that houses the controls fell apart on the second use.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Pearsall

customer_reviews.title: Only 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ear sport headphones in feb 12 by now the microphone doesn't work the volume goes up and down itself, I have two more of headphones and they still working properly but I bought those from jbl website I'm so disappointed the this headphones last 8 months only I don't think I can have a replacement
customer_reviews.author: miguel merino

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: BEST IN EAR HEADPHONES HANDS DOWN. JBL HAS ALWAYS BEEN SUPERIOR IN CAR SPEAKERS. THEY HAVE TOOK THAT AND PUT INTO PORTABILITY. GREAT FOR WORKOUTS AND PHONE CONVERSATIONS.
customer_reviews.author: TSAF NKUF

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, but after a few months, the left ear has stopped working. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas S.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable on long runs
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable on long runs. Bass is too powerful at the low end, but this doesn't really matter when exercising. Biggest complaint is that the cable is just a few inches too short to stretch to my music player clipped to my waistband, resulting in the 2' extension cable being necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love them, stays in on runs, and very comfortable, and sound great
customer_reviews.author: kctom

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, EXCELLENT at blocking wind noise when bike ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, EXCELLENT at blocking wind noise when bike riding!!! Just wish the Android style had repeat last song capability like the Apple version.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but the plug sucks!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing but the plug cable is sucks! It is damaged and hasn't 2 month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product quality is bad
customer_reviews.text: Not solid, it can get damaged easily for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some of my favorite headphones ever--only problem is the wire near the jack ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of my favorite headphones ever--only problem is the wire near the jack will break more easily than the average headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Knauber

customer_reviews.title: and I must say that it is not easy to fall while I am running
customer_reviews.text: The sound is OK (not isolating noises), the mic is ok, and I must say that it is not easy to fall while I am running, which is great
customer_reviews.author: Yossi Benderly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality of sound, however the aux extension cable broke, though this can be replaced easily
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Montague

customer_reviews.title: A must buy !
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable earphones I have ever bought. I love that the cord is non-tangle and the volume control. I would definitely recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: zachary drebin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great bass, fits well, 3 sizes of rubber ear tips, nice collor. Perfect for running. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Veiga

customer_reviews.title: Good bass for workout earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Good bass for workout earbuds, good fin design, large earbud creates a lot of wind noise when cycling, inline remote does not function with Motorola Droid Turbo.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker McKinzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones, nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: The cord is the only thing great about these. I do a lot of running and these just don't stay in my ears. The worst thing is sweat gets behind them and into my ear. This causes me to constantly pull them out and put them back in when running.
customer_reviews.author: Sour Grapes USN

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfortable. Android and Xbox One compatible.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have awesome sound and a few cool features. The interchangeable ear pieces are great, they allow for a snug comfortable fit. They won't fall out if you find the right size. The remote does everything it needs to do for android. The earbuds snap together with magnets to prevent tangling. Part of the cord can be removed for a shorter cord if you use it with a armband. The wire itself is reflective, which is also great. These earbuds are so good that I use them as my main sound while playing the Xbox One.
customer_reviews.author: Leonel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and sound. I've tried lots of different ear buds for running and these do not fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Whats up with that
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are ok but did not come with extension cable as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality headphone, but very heavy for running. would be ok without the cord extention.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Butler

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound. Earbuds stay in place. Low rating received because Earbuds fall off easily and there are no replacements available. Now I have useless high quality earphones collecting dust after less than 2 months of purchasing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia L.

customer_reviews.title: loos fit, but good sound with strong bass
customer_reviews.text: They are okay... I got them for working out with, but the fit is not great, they stay in ear but feel lose. Also they seam to stick out of the ear a lot, but its a small thing. The sound is the best part of them, with a good base level. Im keeping them and They will work, but i would look for somthing better
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Really Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit in ear. Nice design. Really poor sound quality (zero bass), and much static noise when the jack is moved while plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound and more bass than anything I've heard ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound and more bass than anything I've heard at this price. Nice cable that doesn't tangle and has reflective strips.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones somehow manage to load the weight, although light, right on the ear canal casuing pain over a length of time. I also noticed that the small buds were too small and the medium buds fit so tight that ear pressure was discomforting. The tight seal and the tension of the flat cord creates the effect an old school phone line. Any movement along the chord sends a vibration sound through the ear. I noticed this vibration/ noise while turning my head from one computer monitor to the second (about 1 inch of rotation). The bass was pretty good though. Treble was meh.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Noisy/feedback from cord rubbing
customer_reviews.text: These headphones give a lot of noise and feedback whenever the cord rubs on clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These head phones are garbage. I bought them thinking they were good but ...
customer_reviews.text: These head phones are garbage. I bought them thinking they were good but the left one blew on me. I wasn't even playing the music loud. I had to return them just after having them for a week. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. These started off making static noise as soon as I plugged them into my phone and the microphone only worked intermittently. After a month, they began to drop the volume to 0 on their own. Very frustrated with this product and would like a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sound is very nice but when done with ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very nice but when done with ear buds, the ear insert falls off easily and when there are no more, can't use these, for they will hurt our ears.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

product_meta.title: JBL Synchros Reflect-A in-Ear Sport Headphones with Android Control (Black)
product_meta.description: Manufacturer: Harman International Industries, Inc. Manufacturer Part Number: JBLREFLECTABLK. Brand Name: JBL. Product Line: Synchros. Product Name: Reflect Workout-ready, In-ear Sport Headphones. Packaged Quantity: 1. Product Type: Earset. [Additional Product Specifications] Full Product Specifications: Click to view. [Technical Information] Connectivity Technology: Wired. Sound Mode: Stereo. Minimum Frequency Response: 10 Hz. Maximum Frequency Response: 22 kHz. Features: Sweat Proof. Reflective Cable. Ergonomic Design. Magnetic Cable Management. In-line Remote. [Earpiece] Earpiece Design: Earbud. Earpiece Type: Binaural. Driver Size: 0.33". [Microphone] Microphone Design: On-cable. [Interfaces/Ports] Host Interface: Mini-phone. [Physical Characteristics] Color: Black. Form Factor: In-ear. Weight (Approximate): 8.96 oz. [Miscellaneous] Package Contents: Reflect Workout-ready, In-ear Sport Headphones3 x Sizes of ergonomic sport ear-tipsExtension cableQuick Start GuideCarry pouch. [Warranty] Limited Warranty: 1 Year.
